name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程將介紹化工熱力學關注兩大主題之一,能量流動問題(Energy Flow problem),藉由熱力學第一與第二定律之應用,解決化工操作中之能量流動問題
schedule:
1. Thermodynamic: What is it?
2. Mass is not created or destroyed
3. Total energy is not created or destroyed
4. Total entropy cannot decrease
5. Calculation of the properties of pure fluids
scorePolicy:
期中考試(35 %),
期末考試(45 %)
作業(10 %)
平時成績(10 %)
(暫定)
materials: Sandler, S. I.,  Chemical, Biochemical and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc., N. Y. (2005)
